name: Enter the Voxel
description:
A 3D version of "Connect the Dots" inspired by Flow, Q-Bert, and Snake

Chain each dot to it's counterpart without becoming trapped.

- use WASD to move

- press SPACE to:

    - destroy the chain you're currently building, OR

    - destroy a chain directly in front of you

Made in 48 hours for Jame Gam. Enjoy! :)
